code:
gantt
    title Immigrate Portugal Gantt
    dateFormat HH:mm
    section Initial phase
        obtain NIF          :done, nif, 23:59, 4h
        obtain PT esim      :1h
        ActivoBank          : bank, after nif, 3h
        Chave MOvil Digital :cmd, after nif, 1h
    section Before arrival
        Paperwork car import :done,  23:59, 30m
        Ship 20kg DPD :done,  2h
    section Piping
        Map out existing pipes              :active, marking_existing, after underlayer, 30m
        Map out under floor heating         :active, marking_heat, after bin_tiles, 30m
        Map out and mark electric wiring    :active, marking_elec, after underlayer, 30m
        Map out and mark water pipes        :active, marking_water, after underlayer, 30m
        cut out piping                      :3h
        put in wiring pipes + wires         :2h

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 主架构 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 '主架构'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
